Room.Name: Kista Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Kista Avenue, at the west side of the Cathedral of Veratus.
Room.LongDescription: Alturis Road is directly south, giving you a good view of the great Hanging Gardens. There is an apothecary shoppe on the corner just opposite the Cathedral. They charge high prices, but it all goes for a good cause since it is used to support the building fund for the Cathedral.
